name: 現代藝術與文化（二）
description: 針對碩士與博士班創作理論組研究生所準備之課程, 以東方藝術觀念及思潮為教學內容, 並期以提升研究生英文能力為主要教學方向.
goals: To gain knowledge about art and Oriental civilization.
To promote creative and critical thinking skills
To discuss issues about art and oriental cultures in appropriate English.
syllabus:
**課程主旨** **(Goal)**:

For postgraduate students (MA, MFA, PhD) who is studying in art, art history or design, this course is underlining some main concepts and styles of modern art. Involvement in this class is demanded. It means that participant has to present or share the individual idea and opinion with the class from time to time. The aim of this course is also trying to clarify and improve the ability of postgraduate students in English.

**週別進度 (Weekly schedule)**:

1.  Introduction and pilot examination
2.  What are the characteristics of modern art? (1)
3.  What are the characteristics of modern art? (2)
4.  Key concepts of modern art (1)
5.  Key concepts of modern art (2)
6.  Key concepts of modern art (3)
7.  Popular culture in modern age (1)
8.  Popular culture in modern age (2)
9.  Mid-term presentation (1)
10.  Mid-term presentation (2)
11.  Art and culture today (1)
12.  Art and culture today (2)
13.  Art and culture today (3)
14.  Subject matter and personal language (1)
15.  Subject matter and personal language (2)
16.  Group discussion in modern art
17.  Oral Presentation (Final)(1)
18.  Oral Presentation (Final)(2)

Due to the effect of COVID-19, this course provides video record of class regularly to students who temporarily stay in China, Hong Kong and Macao.

According to the harsh situation of pandemic, long distance teaching will be applies to all students of this course as well.
